'''Character Details''' are posts by [[miHoYo]] announcing more details on new [[Characters]] on [[HoYoLAB]], Twitter, Facebook, and Reddit. They include the profile of the character, including their [[birthday]], [[Character Ascension Materials|ascension]] and [[Character Talent Material|talent]] materials, [[Combat Talents]], and some Character Stories and [[Voice-Overs]].

==Trivia==
* Character Detail posts started including previews for the [[character]]'s [[Character Ascension Material]]s and [[Talent Level-Up Material]]s starting with [[Shenhe]].
* Character Detail posts started to be split into two starting with [[Emilie]]. The first having Personal Information, Character Idle Animation Showcase, [[Voice-Over]]s, Impressions, and Hearsay. The second post having combat description, Ascension Materials Preview, Talent Level-Up Materials Preview, Combat Talents, and Passive Talents.
